title: Constant Crash/Disconnect on Mac
body:
Anyone else running Patch 7.2 constantly getting disconnected or crashing?

It will take forever for the client to load, but once in main screen, I don't have issues until a match is made. From there, it takes eternity (if at all) to connect to the game. Just received an Abandon Game/AFK penalty, when I had been spending 30 min trying to just connect to the game itself. I would load to about 40% and crash, causing me to have to close the client, log in, and try to reconnect again (rinse and repeat). Any thoughts? Would a forced repatch help? I'm running Mac OS 10.11.4 (El Capitan) on a wired internet connection with power supply.

replies.body: Are you receiving a specific error message when this happens such as a Bugsplat or Network Disconnection error?
No, no specific error message for the most part. I think every now and then it says that it will disconnect from the PvP server and chat will be disconnected.

It definitely sounds like you're experiencing an *unstable connection* to our servers, then. This could be caused by a few different things, but the best course of action would be to configure your network settings using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) so we can ensure your settings don't conflict with League.

Let me know if these steps helped.
